overview:
Amanda is responsible for strategic revenue generation and marketing for MedCity News.

She joined MedCity News in April 2009, after serving as Vice President of Corporate Communications at National City. She has more than 10 years of media relations experience, including managing communications for Rainbow Babies & Children’s Hospital at University Hospitals Case Medical Center.

In her role as Vice President of Business Development & Marketing, Amanda is solely responsible for managing all aspects of revenue generation and marketing for MedCity News, including advertising, sponsorships, custom content services and syndication opportunities.

relationships.title: Vice president, business development and marketing
